== Requirements  ==
To use measureit you need the following hardware:

  * a computer
this can be an old home computer that is not longer used. The hardware can be very old. Very old means that 64 MB Ram is more than enough... 
  * the smart meter cc128 hardware from [http://www.currentcost.com/ currentcost]

The project was designed with the  [http://www.currentcost.com/product-cc128.html "Envi"] and works also with the [http://www.currentcost.com/product-envir.html "EnviR"]
  * The [http://www.currentcost.com/product-datacable.html Data Cable] from currentcost to connect to your pc
